# retry(destination:)

**Instance Method**

Retries a job that is failed, unacknowledged, and has not been retried before. Successful retries also free up space for [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceUploadJob/jobLimit].

## Declaration

```swift
func retry(destination: URLRequest?)
```

## Processing jobs

- **acknowledge()**: Acknowledges a successful or failed job. Jobs must be acknowledged to free up space for [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceUploadJob/jobLimit].
